entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpjzpnxfaz\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0118.9575] The statement 1003004 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF OPERATIONS includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesMinorityInterestAndIncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments of -64,880,000 in the default should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -75,096,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. If a value is not available then the values associated with the members of the dimension are used to complete the calculation. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-03-29 to 2021-04-03 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesMinorityInterestAndIncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments that should add to -64,880,000 are comprised of the following:
- InterestExpense 82,606,000 + OperatingIncomeLoss 12,618,000 + OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense -5,108,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1003004 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF OPERATIONS. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will add dimension components as well, so if the calculation is correct and the breakdown is a dimension, then check to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly. Values calculated by adding a dimension member are shown in the calculation.
Total Element : us-gaap:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesMinorityInterestAndIncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments Total Value : -64,880,000 Total period : 2020-03-29 to 2021-04-03 Dimensions : Rule Element Id:9575 Rule version: 16.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/914025/000091402521000019/plt-20210403.htm 4
